import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../styles/Auth.css"; const Auth = () => { const [isLogin, setIsLogin] = useState(true); // State to toggle between login and signup const [isForgotPassword, setIsForgotPassword] = useState(false); // State to show forgot password form const handleToggle = () => { setIsLogin(!isLogin); // Toggle between login and signup }; const handleForgotPassword = () => { setIsForgotPassword(true); // Show forgot password form }; const handleBackToLogin = () => { setIsForgotPassword(false); // Return to login form }; return (
{isForgotPassword ? (
Forgot Password
) : ( <>
Login Form
Signup Form
)}
{isForgotPassword ? (
Back to Login
) : ( <>
{isLogin ? (
Forgot password?
) : (
)}
)}
); }; export default Auth;
